meta.description: Xanzhu provides helpful articles, guides and tips on all things technology. Focusing on privacy, security and more.

home.feature-desc: News, guides and reviews on technology, how to use it and how to ensure your data remains is protected online.
home.landing-desc: Xanzhu is a platform for sharing knowledge. Help set the standard for the next generation of privacy and accessibility. Teaches how to use technology and stay safe online.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p-1: We value privacy and respect those who visit our website. No identifiable information is stored or accessed without your permission to ensure that we do not infringe upon your privacy.
privacy.p-2: Because our site contains links to third-party websites, we cannot prevent tracking outside of our domain.
privacy.p-3: Usage data that your browser provides (User-Agent), includes IP addresses, browsers and devices used. This data is used for metrics and server communications.
